metadata.name: John Thompson
metadata.description:
John Thompson was an astronaut explorer on a mission to explore a distant planet. He and his crewmates had been traveling for months, and they were excited to finally reach their destination.

But as they were entering the planet's atmosphere, something went wrong. The ship started to shake violently, and before John knew it, they had crashed on the surface of the alien planet.

He was the only survivor.

John tried to contact mission control, but there was no response. He was completely alone on this planet.

He wandered for days, searching for any signs of life or a way to signal for help. But there was nothing. He was truly alone.

As the days turned into weeks, John began to accept the fact that he would never be able to go home again. He was stranded on this alien planet, and there was no hope of rescue.

One day, as he was wandering near a lake, John sat down and looked out at the water. In that moment, John realized that he would never see his home again.
